name: Anglerfish

name: Argus Wrasse

description: Playful underwater acrobat, hunting fish, resting on rocky outcrops, bold, curious, agile, social interactions, noisy and charming pinniped of Southern coasts.

name: Aussie Sea Lion
description: Playful underwater, foraging benthic prey, resting on remote islands, unique 18-month breeding cycle across southern Australian waters.

name: Aussie Snubfin Dolphin
description: Small, pinkish face, coastal tropical pods, curious, playful, photogenic, social, subtle estuary and nearshore hunter, charming reef companion.

name: Australian Gregory

name: Banded Morwong
description: Feeds on small urchins which may play a role in controlling numbers

description: Slender, banded, burrowing sandy predator, peeking, ambushing crustaceans, subtle undulations, shy, cryptic, reef’s hidden stealth hunter, elegant and secretive.

name: Barreleye

name: Birdnose Wrasse female

description: Elongated snout probing sand and coral crevices, females green, males blue, darting swiftly across lagoons and reef slopes.
